Your culminating assignment/project in the quantitative section of EDUC 7312: Research III Advanced Design and Methods will be a practice version of the quantitative portion of your qualifying exam. In the practice and actual versions of your quantitative qualifying exam you will be presented with X data-driven vignettes in which you will use SPSS to **visualize**, **describe**, **analyze**, and **interpret** the results of a number of research problems. 

Your Practice Quantitative Qualifying Exam l is due **Friday, December 04, 2020.**
